questions.question_text: Show that if x² – 5x + 6 = 0, then x = 3 or x = 2.
Prove that the function f : R → R defined by f(x) = 2x + 5 is one-one.
hints: Use definition of one-one function: f(x1) = f(x2) ⇒ x1 = x2

questions.question_text: Show that if A = [[cos θ, sin θ], [-sin θ, cos θ]], then Aⁿ = [[cos nθ, sin nθ], [-sin nθ, cos nθ]].
hints: Assume P(k) true and prove P(k+1) using matrix multiplication

questions.question_text: Show that in any triangle ABC, a = b cos C + c cos B.
hints: Consider three cases: ∠C acute, obtuse, and right angle
Use trigonometric ratios in right triangles

questions.question_text: Show that the set of all prime numbers is infinite.
hints: Assume the set is finite and list all primes
Show N has a prime factor not in the list

questions.question_text: Prove that the function f : R → R defined by f(x) = 2x + 5 is one-one using contrapositive.
hints: Contrapositive: if x1 ≠ x2 then f(x1) ≠ f(x2)
Start with x1 ≠ x2 and manipulate to show 2x1+5 ≠ 2x2+5

questions.question_text: Show that 'if a matrix A is invertible, then A is non singular'.
hints: Prove contrapositive: if A is singular (|A|=0), then A is not invertible
Use formula for inverse involving adjugate and determinant

questions.question_text: Disprove: For each n, 2^(2ⁿ) + 1 is a prime (n ∈ N).
Disprove: Every continuous function is differentiable.
hints: Show it is continuous but not differentiable at x=0
